sentences.en: a fox with its leg in a trap
sentences.cn: 被夹子夹住腿的狐狸

sentences.en: Amanda felt that marriage was a trap.
sentences.cn: 阿曼达觉得婚姻是个牢笼。

sentences.en: Dozens of people were trapped in the rubble when the building collapsed.
sentences.cn: 楼房倒塌，很多人被困在了瓦砾下面。

sentences.en: Everyone is working flat out to try to trap those responsible.
sentences.cn: 每个人都在全力以赴，设法捉住那些罪魁祸首。

sentences.en: He felt he had been trapped into accepting the terms of the contract.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己是中了圈套才接受这合同条款的。

sentences.en: He stepped into a bear trap covered in snow.
sentences.cn: 他踩到了埋在雪里的一个捕熊夹。

sentences.en: How many rabbits have you trapped in your special trap this week?
sentences.cn: 这个星期你用特制的捕兽器具捕捉了多少只兔子?

sentences.en: I wondered if it was an animal caught in a trap.
sentences.cn: 我在想，会不会是什么动物掉进了陷阱。

sentences.en: I would hate him to think I'm trying to trap him.
sentences.cn: 我不愿让他以为我是在给他设圈套。

sentences.en: It's a trap too many people fall into.
sentences.cn: 太多人都掉进了这个陷阱中。

sentences.en: Journalists informed police who planted an undercover detective to trap Smith.
sentences.cn: 记者通知了警方，后者于是为诱捕史密斯而安插了一名卧底侦探。

sentences.en: Mr Smith has walked straight into a trap laid by the Tories.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生直接落入了保守党布设的圈套。

sentences.en: Suspecting nothing, he walked right into the trap.
sentences.cn: 他毫无觉察，径直走入陷阱。

sentences.en: The locals were encouraged to trap and kill mice to stop the spread of the virus.
sentences.cn: 当地人被鼓励用捕捉器捕杀老鼠以阻止病毒的传播。

sentences.en: The only way to catch mice is to set a trap .
sentences.cn: 抓老鼠的唯一办法就是放置捕鼠器。

sentences.en: The police trapped the terrorists at a roadblock.
sentences.cn: 警察在设有路障的地方堵住了恐怖分子。

sentences.en: The team posed as drug dealers to trap the ringleaders.
sentences.cn: 该队队员装扮成毒品贩子，诱捕罪犯头目。

sentences.en: The trap had cut deeply into the rabbit's flesh.
sentences.cn: 捕夹深深嵌入了兔子的肉里。

sentences.en: There’s no way out! We’re trapped!
sentences.cn: 出不去！我们被困住了！

sentences.en: They walked right into a booby-trap and got blown to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 他们正好踩上了饵雷，结果被炸得粉身碎骨。

sentences.en: This landscape seemed to trap and amplify sounds.
sentences.cn: 这种地貌好像可以笼住并放大声音。

sentences.en: This type of trap uses no bait or other attractant.
sentences.cn: 这种陷阱不用诱饵或其他引诱物。

sentences.en: To my immense gratification, he fell into the trap.
sentences.cn: 令我极为满意的是, 他中了圈套.

sentences.en: Twenty miners were trapped underground.
sentences.cn: 20名矿工被困在地下。

sentences.en: Were you just trying to trap her into making some admission?
sentences.cn: 你刚才是想诱使她供认吗？

words.tran_cn: 捕获的；陷入困境的；收集的；受到限制的
设陷阱捕兽者；捕捉器；[矿业] 矿井风门开关管理员
诱捕（trap的ing形式）；设陷阱；阻止；使密封于管内
诱捕；使…受限制；使…陷入困境

phrases.tran_cn: 恶作剧；[军]诡雷；诱杀装置
气体收集器；气体分离器；气阱
疏水阀；疏水器；汽水分离器；凝汽阀
[建]天窗；陷阱门；[建]地板或屋顶上的活门

trans.tran_cn: (捕鸟兽的)陷阱/夹子/罗网，圈套，骗局，困境，嘴，双轮轻便马车
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment for catching animals

trans.tran_cn: 使陷入困境，设陷阱捕捉，卡/夹/绊住，收集，吸收，诱骗，抓捕
trans.tran_en: If you trap someone into doing or saying something, you trick them so that they do or say it, although they did not want to
If you trap someone into doing or saying something, you trick them so that they do or say it, although they did not want to
